faqs.title: Why buy on Artsy?
faqs.content: Powered by industry-leading technology, Artsy enables collectors to buy more efficiently and confidently from the largest network of trusted galleries, auction houses, and art fairs.

faqs.title: How do I buy art on Artsy?
faqs.content: Message galleries via Artsy to learn more about your favorite artists and purchase their works. You can also use Artsy to place bids in top auctions worldwide.

faqs.title: Does Artsy take a commission on sales?
faqs.content: Artsy does not take a commission on the sale of artworks, neither from the collector nor the gallery partner.
